scripts.release:canary-nobump: npm run copy-npmrc && npm run registry-publish-canary
scripts.release:nobump: npm run copy-npmrc && npm run registry-publish
scripts.release:canary: npm run bump:canary && npm run copy-npmrc && npm run registry-publish-canary
scripts.release:patch: npm run bump:patch && npm run copy-npmrc && npm run registry-publish
scripts.release:minor: npm run bump:minor && npm run copy-npmrc && npm run registry-publish
scripts.release:major: npm run bump:major && npm run copy-npmrc && npm run registry-publish
scripts.copy-npmrc: cp .npmrc ./packages/adaptable && cp .npmrc ./packages/adaptable-react-aggrid && cp .npmrc ./packages/adaptable-ng-aggrid && cp .npmrc ./packages/adaptable-nocode && cp .npmrc ./packages/plugins/charts && cp .npmrc ./packages/plugins/finance
scripts.registry-publish-canary: cd packages/adaptable && npm run registry-publish-canary && cd ../../packages/adaptable-react-aggrid && npm run registry-publish-canary && cd ../../packages/adaptable-ng-aggrid && npm run registry-publish-canary && cd ../../packages/plugins/charts && npm run registry-publish-canary && cd ../finance && npm run registry-publish-canary
scripts.registry-publish: cd packages/adaptable && npm run registry-publish && cd ../../packages/adaptable-react-aggrid && npm run registry-publish && cd ../../packages/adaptable-ng-aggrid && npm run registry-publish && cd ../../packages/plugins/charts && npm run registry-publish && cd ../finance && npm run registry-publish
scripts.install-core: npm install --prefix packages/adaptable && npm run --prefix packages/adaptable rm-native-types
scripts.build: npm run tsc-core && npm run build-core && npm run build-react && npm run build-angular
scripts.tsc: npm run tsc-core && npm run tsc-react && npm run tsc-angular && npm run tsc-nocode
